catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 73
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: six-panel screen which combines abstract and geometric painting with vignettes and writing; each panel hosts nine squares; each square contains either a figurative painting or Japanese characters; gold leaf covers the majority of each panel and purple and silver rectangles cap the top and bottom of each panel
medium: ink, color, gold, and silver on paper
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair
title: Scenes from The Tale of Genji
